summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 12th Avenue Development Plan; authorizing contracts for the sale of property; authorizing a work program for the Development Plan, appropriating past and future property sales and lease revenue from the Cumulative Reserve Fund - Main Fund (CIP \#25090 - 12th Avenue Development Project) for administrative and implementation costs for the Plan; designating the Department of Neighborhoods as the department responsible for its implementation; and directing the Department of Construction and Land Use to study certain zoning and land use issues.
